summary: This week I gave the Plant page a glassy redesign, added seasonal animations to the logo, and standardized all the icons across the navigation and roadmap. Also fixed a handful of small bugs, like the duplicate BookOpen icon in the footer.

features: add unique icons to Midnight Bloom roadmap items
redesign signup page with warm glassy sections
add expressive icons to all roadmap items and footer
add Lucide icons to feature rows in pricing table
redesign with glass aesthetic and add GlassNavbar component
add pricing tier icons to match Plant page
add GlassLogo component with glassmorphism styling
add seasonal variations to GlassLogo component
add GlassLogo to asset viewer tool
add nature components library to engine package
fixes: use Sprout icon for Plant Your Blog button
use Newspaper icon for Blog to avoid BookOpen duplication
resolve duplicate Moon import in roadmap
replace class: directive with conditional class string
use $derived.by for complex derived value in GlassLogo
refactoring: reduce HTML repetition and improve pricing tier icons
improve Logo and GlassLogo with seasonal defaults and better breathing animation
chores: remove dist folder from git tracking
